text: The Sassuntsi-Davit Tank Regiment (; previously the 119th Separate Rifle Tank (Mixed) Regiment) was a Soviet separate tank regiment during the Second World War. It had a lot of ethnic Armenians in it. Other ethnic groups that were in the regiment included Azeris, but they were largely relegated to logistics support and other non-combatant roles. Category:20th century in Armenia Category:History of Azerbaijan Category:1940s in the Soviet Union Category:Military of the Soviet Union
title: Sassuntsi-Davit Tank Regiment
